author: zenedits
post_text: November 22, 2016 at 4:19 PM#1I'm really new to grandMA2 as many of you can probably tell but my question is how do i set up executes so I can turn them on and off. I want my lights to move in a certain way then select another way and then the old movement will stop and the new one will start. If anyone also has a link to someone's post about setting up execute cues so you can press a button and everything that you selected will play that would be great. Thank you
